articles.title: New China Map Draws More Rejection, 4 Asian Countries Back India's Call - NDTV
articles.description: Vietnam said China's official map released this week violates its sovereignty over the Spratly and Paracel Islands and jurisdiction over its waters, according to a statement posted on the nation's government news website.
articles.content:
China claims more than 80% of the South China Sea.
